attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current prime minister is not one who was elected by the people in a general election but one who has been appointed by the current government.

In the interest of democracy we call on the prime minister to call a general election to allow the public to choose who should be prime minister rather than have that decision imposed on them

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
